title: The Silent Broadcast
outcome: A mysterious citywide broadcast, featuring Halden’s recorded voice, is released. The message stirs public memory and reveals the origins and ethical failures of BCI. Citizens stage collective acts of defiance: open profile swapping, memorial gatherings, and distributed protests. Ghosts use broadcast clues to unlock hidden BCI functions, exposing old erasure records and system manipulation by Council factions. Directorate attempts to suppress unrest with targeted restrictions, but cracks in BCI routines allow mass noncompliance, forcing the Council toward a reckoning and possible systemic reform.

events.description: A citywide broadcast interrupts all devices, playing fragments of Halden’s last message reflecting on BCI’s creation, erasures, and regrets.
Inspired by the broadcast, citizens begin synchronizing acts of noncompliance: swapping digital identities, holding candlelight vigils, and blocking BCI checkpoints.
Ghosts use clues in Halden’s message to unlock hidden BCI admin panels, revealing records of forced disappearances and Council-ordered score manipulations.
The Directorate imposes targeted digital restrictions but cannot stem mass disobedience as BCI stability falters. Public protests escalate citywide.
Council factions publicly debate the future of BCI, forced by exposed truths and unrest. Citizens demand complete reform or abolishment of the system.
